title: Tracking page: stories show no updates
description: None of the tracked stories are showing any updates, even when updates should exist. This suggests a failure in the background matching or grouping logic.

title: Investigate unexpected NewsAPI quota usage (145 requests)
description:
User reported 145 API requests on NewsAPI dashboard despite only opening the app ~10 times. Need to identify where extra requests are coming from.

## Steps to reproduce
1. Wait for NewsAPI quota to reset (~18 hours from 2026-02-02)
2. Clear app data on device
3. Rebuild and run app
4. Check Logcat filter 'NewsAPI-Request' to see all API calls
5. Compare Logcat request count with NewsAPI dashboard

## Added debugging
- Detailed request logging in RateLimitInterceptor (commit c75d597)
- Logs: request number, timestamp, endpoint, call stack, response code

## Possible causes
- Multiple ViewModel recreations triggering repeated API calls
- Flow collection issues causing duplicate requests
- Unknown background process

## Updates
- 2026-02-04: Did not notice any API limit behavior during Phase 2 validations. Leaving issue open to see if it happens again.
close_reason: Fixed by Phase 1 caching infrastructure. Feed responses now cached with 3-hour TTL (CACHE-02). OkHttp 50 MiB HTTP cache prevents duplicate API calls. No quota issues observed during Phase 2 testing.

title: Feed quality: Trusted sources missing from main feed
description: Main story feed shows many similar stories but very few from the most trusted sources. User asks: 'from the newsAPI top stories feed?'. Need to verify API endpoint usage (top-headlines vs everything) and source weightings.

title: Add track hint tooltip and improve button placement
description: Bead 4: Add a tooltip or hint explaining that long-press tracks a story. Also improve the placement of the 'Track' button that pops up.

title: Wire Beads into Claude Code on Windows
close_reason: Beads fully wired into Claude Code on Windows: CLI available, git hooks installed, merge driver configured, CLAUDE.md instructions present, startup hooks running.

title: Reduce unused space above page titles (NavHost top padding)
description: Bead 5: Reduce unused space (likely status bar area) above the page title on all app pages. Fix implemented in MainActivity.kt by ensuring NavHost ignores top inset.

title: Fix API endpoint duplication in NewsApiService
description: NewsApiService defines searchArticles() twice (lines 18-24 and 33-41) with different signatures. Second definition overrides first, losing sortBy parameter. Consolidate into single method with optional parameters.
close_reason: Consolidated two duplicate searchArticles() methods into a single method with the union of all parameters (language, sortBy, from, to, page, pageSize). Removed stale // ADD THIS comments. Build verified.

title: UI: Source rating badges missing
description: Source rating badges (reliability shields/bias icons) no longer display for sources. This is a regression in the UI.

title: Compare Perspectives misses clearly related stories (e.g. 5 duplicate stories)
description: Bead 3: Many similar stories in the main feed are not showing up in 'Compare Perspectives', even when they are clearly related (e.g., 5 stories about the same thing, but none reference each other).

title: Allow untracking from Story Page
description: Bead 1: Allow user to clear bookmark icon to untrack a story directly from the story/article page. Currently, user can only untrack via the trash can icon on the Tracked Stories view.

title: Main Feed Duplicates (Clustering Failure)
description: Multiple stories about the same topic (e.g. Amber Glenn) appear separately in the feed.
close_reason: Fixed by lowering Jaccard threshold to 0.2 and adding stop-word filtering in NewsRepository.

title: Tracking page: original story link missing for some stories
description: The link to the original story on the tracking page has disappeared for some stories.

title: Duplicate Tracked Stories
description: Clicking Follow on an article creates a new story even if the article or a similar story is already tracked.
close_reason: Fixed in TrackingRepository by checking for existing story ID before insertion.

title: Implement match/comparison result caching
description: Cache article comparison results so tapping Compare on the same article doesn't re-trigger API search calls. Store matched articles by source article URL in Room DB. Reduces API quota burn from repeated comparisons. Depends on feed caching establishing the caching patterns.

title: Implement feed response caching with TTL
description: Cache NewsAPI feed responses in Room DB with 2-4 hour TTL. Feed should load instantly from cache (cache-first strategy), then refresh in background. Critical for offline UX and API quota management (100 req/day). Add Article entity, DAO, and repository caching logic.
close_reason: Cache-first pattern implemented in NewsRepository with 3h TTL, FeedCacheDao, CachedArticleDao, and offline-first degradation

title: Compare Perspectives shows unrelated stories
description: Bead 2: Users are seeing unrelated stories appearing in the 'Compare Perspectives' view. Need to investigate matching logic or UI filtering.

title: Fix entity extraction bugs (mixed case, acronyms)
description: Current entity extraction in ArticleMatchingRepositoryImpl (lines 165-171) requires full capitalization, missing entities like 'Goldman Sachs', 'New York Times', and acronyms like GOP/FDA/USA. Fix character-by-character uppercase check to handle multi-word proper nouns, mixed case entities, and common acronyms. Add known-entity dictionary for common news entities.

title: Tracking page: last updated time disappears after navigation
description: After leaving and returning to the Tracking page, the last updated time disappears and no longer displays.

title: Fix clickable area for tracked story cards
description: The tracking cards in TrackingScreen are not fully clickable. Only the title text is clickable. Make the entire card clickable to open the story.

title: Compare Perspectives Bias Spectrum doesn't include original story dot
Feed quality: Unrated sources over-represented
description: The main feed contains too many stories from unrated sources (e.g., Slashdot) compared to rated/trusted sources. Need to check if we are filtering or prioritizing sources correctly.

title: Investigate paywall detection failure
description: Paywall detection does not seem to work as expected. Investigate and fix.

title: Add NewsAPI rate limit detection and graceful handling
description: Implement OkHttp interceptor for 429/503 responses with exponential backoff. Add request counter to track daily quota usage. Show user feedback when quota is low or exhausted. Fall back to cached data when rate limited instead of showing errors. Files: NetworkModule.kt, new RateLimitInterceptor.
close_reason: Rate limit detection with RateLimitInterceptor, QuotaRepository, and user-facing toast implemented
